title: WCW Spring Stampede
content:
Hey everyone, Ive been looking for this font for a long time,

I have tryed to clean the image as much as possible.

If anyone can give me any help then i would be eternally grateful.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [f3bdf76e2be9a7f90867afa3ec250369.72869.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014094600/http:/typophile.com/files/f3bdf76e2be9a7f90867afa3ec250369.72869.png) | 71.16 KB |
author: bluepink

comments.content:
feels very modified from maybe a Latin font, like this one (as a very quick example, better sources likely exist):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014094600im_/http:/typophile.com/files/snap_3756.png)

doesn't seem like it would take much to curve the joins and make the other mods.

looking at the rest of the ad (via [Imageshack link](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014094600/http:/imageshack.us/photo/my-images/412/springstampedecover2ij5.jpg/)) i see more latin-like fonts used at the bottom.
